physical_appearance:This is an octagonal shaped pouch. It is knitted from tough cord. The pouch has a green strap. It opens by a flap at the top. The edges are bordered by red
 white and pink knitted cord.

subject_terms_3:
sgcool_label_text:This octagonal shaped pouch is knitted from a tough purple cord. The pouch is attached with a green strap and comprises of 2 pockets. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of garments worn by Peranakan men and women.
